caption.p: Additional file 3: Figure S2. (a) Cell cycle stress induced pseudohyphae in CNB oil exposed RSY150. Mid log phase RSY150 after 4 h exposure to CNB oil at MIC and 1/2 MIC, were stained with CFW. Images are epifluorescence (top panel) and bright field (BF; bottom panel). Bar = 5 μm. (b) Quantification of cells in control, MIC and 1/2 MIC from (a). Double asterisks represent p < 0.05.
